Activate desktop notifications.other: Activer les notifications sur l'espace de travail

Display a new entry with all events happ.other: Display a new entry with all events happening on a user workspaces, and alerts. An SQL database must be setup for the FEED_DRIVER configuration.

Display workspaces activity to the users.other: Affiche un widget avec un flux d'activité dans le panneau d'information.

Handle users watches and notifications.other: Gestion des notifications et des alertes.
